errors.required: Enter a property number or name
errors.format: Property number or name must only include letters, numbers, hyphens, apostrophes, full stops and spaces
errors.length: Property number or name must have 35 characters or less

errors.format: Enter a street name in the correct format
errors.length: Street name must be 35 characters or less

errors.format: Enter a town or city in the correct format
errors.length: Town or city must be 35 characters or less

errors.format: Enter a postcode in the correct format, like AA1 1AA
